column4: Question: when I did a clean install of 9.04, it panicked even during failsafe boot. Would upgrading in 8.10 using the update tool be a better idea, or is it likely to keep crashing?
Because I think it wasn't handling my PCMCIA card properly (said something about a PC card during bootup)
I guess if you upgrade from 8,10 you can still pick an old kernel
